articles.title: Comparing code readers and scan tools
articles.description:
John Paul, AAA Northeast's Car Doctor, hears from a reader deciding between a vehicle code reader and a scan tool.

The post Comparing code readers and scan tools appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: John Paul from AAA Northeast advises on choosing between code readers and scan tools.
Local residents can enhance vehicle diagnostics with proper tools for better maintenance.
Understanding these tools can save Boston drivers time and money on repairs.

articles.title: Gloucester nonprofit launches support fund for Lily Jean crew member families
articles.description:
The seven crew members of the Lily Jean fishing vessel are presumed dead after their ship sank outside Cape Ann last week.

The post Gloucester nonprofit launches support fund for Lily Jean crew member families appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Seven crew members of the Lily Jean are presumed dead after the vessel sank.
Gloucester nonprofit has launched a support fund for affected families.
Local community rallies to provide financial assistance to grieving families.

articles.title: Red Sox reportedly sign infielder Isiah Kiner-Falefa to 1-year contract
articles.description:
Kiner-Falefa is a former Gold Glove winner, but doesn't have a lot of pop at the plate.

summary: Red Sox sign infielder Isiah Kiner-Falefa to a 1-year contract.
Kiner-Falefa is a former Gold Glove winner, enhancing Boston's infield defense.
His signing may impact team dynamics and batting lineup for the upcoming season.

articles.title: Vince Wilfork calls out Tom Brady for not picking Patriots to win Super Bowl LX

summary: Vince Wilfork criticized Tom Brady for not supporting the Patriots in Super Bowl LX.

Brady's lack of support may affect local fan morale ahead of the game.

articles.title: When did Mike Vrabel, Stefon Diggs realize Drake Maye was going to be special?

articles.title: Car crashes into Boston Common near Frog Pond, 1 hospitalized
articles.description:
A car crashed into the Common after the driver appeared to have a medical emergency, police said.

The post Car crashes into Boston Common near Frog Pond, 1 hospitalized appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: A car crashed into Boston Common near Frog Pond on February 4.
The driver suffered a medical emergency, resulting in one hospitalization.
The incident raises concerns about safety in popular public spaces.

articles.title: Worcester now prohibits ICE action on city property. Is Boston next?
articles.description:
Following other New England communities, federal immigration agents won't be able to prep or stage in Worcester's municipal parks or lots.

The post Worcester now prohibits ICE action on city property. Is Boston next? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Worcester prohibits ICE actions in municipal parks and lots as of February 2026.
This policy aligns Worcester with other New England cities taking similar stances.
Boston residents may see increased pressure for similar protections against federal immigration actions.

articles.title: Jeffrey Epstein wanted Robert Kraft to hire his lawyer amid Patriots owner’s prostitution case, documents show
articles.description:
After the Patriots owner was charged in 2019, the lawyer he eventually hired was directly connected to Epstein.

The post Jeffrey Epstein wanted Robert Kraft to hire his lawyer amid Patriots owner’s prostitution case, documents show appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Robert Kraft was charged in a prostitution case in 2019.
Documents reveal Jeffrey Epstein suggested Kraft hire his lawyer, who was later chosen.
This connection raises concerns about legal representation for Boston's prominent figures.
